participant_1.background:
I like cheeseburgers and doing laundry on weekends.
My cupcake business keeps me busy, but I also enjoy hiking and biking in my new home state of Florida.
my mother was born in ireland.
I'm a potter, and I also enjoy photographing my everyday life.
I am raising my kids on my own.

participant_2.background:
My parents are my heroes.
I like to learn about the world, but I do not always listen to my doctor.
I wake up and check my phone for messages from potential dates.
I live alone and cook for myself.
I still enjoy my meat but have become a responsible adult.

content.text: Hey, how are you doing?
Good, I'm a little tired but I'm good.
Same, I've been working on a cupcake recipe and it's been taking a lot of time.
Oh, that's cool! What kind of cupcake recipe are you working on?
I'm trying to make a chocolate cupcake with a peanut butter filling.
Yum, that sounds delicious!
Thanks, I hope it turns out well.
I'm sure it will! I love peanut butter and chocolate together.
Me too!
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to hike and bike, I also like to take pictures of my everyday life.
Those sound like fun things to do. I like to learn about the world, but I don't always listen to my doctor.
Haha, I can relate to that. What's your favorite thing to learn about?
I like to learn about different cultures and history.
Those are both really interesting things to learn about.
Yeah, they are. I also like to learn about new foods.
Me too! I love trying new foods.
What's your favorite food?
It's hard to say, I like a lot of different foods.
Me too! I like to eat everything.
Same here.
I know we're both busy but we should get together sometime and do something fun.
That sounds like a great idea
